strIntroduction: 搭乘最新型號的直升機 ，很快你就看到自己從地面升高，地上的建築物越來越細小，從上空俯瞰整個香港，跟在平地是完全截然不同的全新視角！體驗完直升機之旅後還可以到香港五星級的半島酒店享用下午茶，絕對給你超越一般人的非凡享受！

strIntroduction: 特別的氣象瓶，於密閉的玻璃容器中，會隨著氣溫和濕度的相差而形成不同型態的結晶，從結晶可以看出不同的天氣變化，更是件藝術品！

strIntroduction: 今次花窨茶甜點工作坊有造型特別茶包曲奇，淡淡茶香，有法國風味及薰衣草或薑茶味，沾上三色巧克力，口味細緻。窨茶部份可以揀安神減壓的薰衣草綠茶或最啱冬天暖暖薑茶，回家享用親手窨茶作品，再加上峰蜜，黑糖或桂圓，別具風味！
strLocation: Hong Kong and Macau, Hong Kong
strTitle: Tea Bag Cookies & Flowers scenting tea Workshop

strIntroduction: Situated at “Main Street, USA” in Hong Kong Disneyland, canton cuisine Plaza Inn is inspired by the movie "Mulan", dining in a fun-filled décor featuring cartoon characters such as the dragon “Mushu” and “Mulan”, takes you right back to the Chinese tradition inspired by the movie “Mulan”. A variety of Disney inspired dim sums and desserts are also served only at Plaza Inn to complete the magical journey for visitors to the park.
strLocation: Hong Kong and Macau, Hong Kong
strTitle: Hong Kong Disneyland "Plaza Inn" Restaurant ALL-DAY SET e-voucher

strIntroduction: This is a vegetarian restaurant which turns the signature dishes of their cooperate restaurants to vegetarian dishes. They will donate part of their profit for charities.

strIntroduction: The Broadway boasts a vast array of over 40 local and Asian food and beverage outlets in a hawker-style street market setting that takes us back to the hustle and bustle of traditional Macau street markets, with authentic food, friendly service, entertainment and fun.

strTitle: The Broadway Macau meals set E-voucher

strIntroduction: The Lotus - Vietnamese Cuisine – upholding the spiritual and materialistic values of the Lotus; plus an enthusiastic attitude, a series of tasty Vietnamese dishes with Lotus as the main theme aiming at both healthy body and appearance has been mooted; creativity merged with traditional culinary delights helps our customers to select authentic Vietnamese snacks and supple noodles. Vietnamese food lovers will not be disappointed.
strLocation: Hong Kong and Macau, Hong Kong
strTitle: Wan Chai “The Lotus - Vietnamese Cuisine” E-voucher (worth $100 HKD)
